column4: Hey, I just apt-got GTK-GNUTELLA and I can find it in the Internet or Multimedia tabs. Where is this located?
Hey, I just apt-got GTK-GNUTELLA and I can find it in the Internet or Multimedia tabs. Where is this located
it may not have been added to the GNOME menu -- try logging in again. if that doesn't work, you'll need to add it yourself.
